item.title: R√®glement int√©rieur de l'association OpenFisca
item.description: 1. Working language Due to its international nature, the Foundation operates with English as its working language. 2. Membership 1) Eligibility A. College A (college of supporters) The only condition for joining college A is to pay the membership fee. B. College B (college of legal entities using OpenFisca) Only legal entities (and not natural persons) can join college B. To join college B, a legal entity must: pay the membership fee; list at least one active use case on the public OpenFisca website.
